Title: Prohibits approved providers of child health insurance coverage from discriminating against health care providers not participating in the insurer's network
Summary: Prohibits approved organizations providing coverage under the child health insurance plan from discriminating against health care providers which do not participate in the organization's health care network.
LawCode: Amd ยง2511, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting approved organizations in the child health insurance plan from limiting the participation of certain health care providers
